page.title: 18WILBERFOSS NEW ARRIVALS
page.content: In Wilberfoss there is much new housing and there are always "For sale" and "Sold" signs to be seen. Most people who have moved into the village have come because of job changes or promotion. Few newcomers have come here to retire.They all seem to like it here in the country and say how quiet and peaceful it is. They also mention how friendly people in the village are. Many mentioned how useful the new extended village shop is for most of their household needs, although most did their main weekly shopping at supermarkets in York or Pocklington. Families have come from many parts of the country, Doncaster, Durham, Norwich and Berkshire to name but 4. At present there are 4 building companies erecting housing in the village, but land is getting scarce.
